phrases: In order to stop the out-of-control Laxus,
Erza, and even Mystogan, challenged him in battle.
But after an unexpected turn of events,
Erza headed to destroy the Thunder Palace on her own,
while Natsu and Laxus began a confrontation with the guild on the line!
Our high-flyin' lives are every which way!
When the sun goes down, there is a bon voyage bash.
It are not sad at all.
As long as we are alive, we will meet again somewhere!
Blast straight through a headwind, set off!
Stay strong until the tears dry up!
A man got to be tough.
As proof of our strong, strong bonds!
Now, grab that map to the shining future!
If I want to destroy them all at once, I still need more...
I am already out of magical power.
And I am also out of time.
There is not even three minutes until the Thunder Palace activates!
Are not nothing... going to happen!
And if there is anyone still fighting, hold up for now!
There is a voice in my head...
He can speak directly into people's minds.
We got to destroy those things floating in the sky with all the magic power we got!
It is a magic spell from Laxus that will attack the city!
Warren, why do you know about the Thunder Palace?
I see, so it was you.
Took me a while to find the guy.
You are not turned to stone?
My telepathy cannot reach all the way to the guild.
We will have to do it with the people who can hear me.
Destroy those things up in the sky!
Did you forget what you did to me?
I am sorry about that, man...
I was, like, really trying to save Erza and the others, so...
You think that is going to cut it?
You hit me with a sneak attack!
We are not going to forgive you, Laki!
Destroy the things floating in the sky!
You do not get it, do you?
When I do not hold back, I am way stronger!
You always attack first, think later!
This is not the time to be fighting!
The people of the city are in real danger!
We have to all work together to protect the city of Magnolia!
If we combine our powers, we can overcome anything!
That is what I have learned after coming here.
I know I just joined Fairy Tail recently.
But my feelings for this guild are as strong as anybody's!
Tail has been my dream since long ago...
It is always been my goal.
And if that will not convince you...
I will destroy all the lacrima myself!
You really going to let the newbie one up you like that?
She is not new any more...
She is got more Fairy Tail spirit than any of us!
I cannot argue with that, now can I?
Thanks to you, I am thinking straight again.
Warren, we will settle this after those things are destroyed.
You sure prance around a lot for an old man.
They have Body Link magic protecting them!
If you attack them, you will get damaged yourself!
Even if it hurts, I will do it anyway!
I always looked up to Fairy Tail...
And I have gotten to be such good friends with everyone...
Sure, a lot of things have happened...
But everyone has always been so warm.
This guild is where I belong.
My heart yells out This is where I should be!
So I am going to fight!
Because it was Fairy Tail that made me strong!
I will handle the 200 to the north!
The rest of you destroy all the ones around the south!
Do not leave a single one left!
Fairy Tail just keeps doing things flashier and flashier each year.
Birds of a feather, you know...
We really are a great guild.
And we would be even better if Laxus got over this rebellious phase.
What part of this guild needs to be changed?
We are all in the same circle of friends.
You never even tried to join that circle!
How are you going to become the master, Laxus?
How am I going to become the master, you say?
Tail will never be yours now.
Trying to force a bargain was pointless...
I should have relied on my own power from the start!
This overwhelming power is my very identity!
So when I beat that power, you will finally give in, Laxus?!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
Fall from the heavens and turn all to ashes!
Who was the strongest in the guild again?
You cannot answer because you have been turned to dust!
Something is wrong with you being happy he is wiped out.
Gettin' rid of him is my role.
Anyone who stands in my way should just disappear!
I have got a personal grudge with him.
His monstrous strength is the real deal though.
He is got Makarov's blood running in him.
I do not like it, but we have got no choice.
I am going to defeat Laxus!
I mean, how could I ever team up with you?!
Is that the Laxus you know?
That is an enemy of the guild.
We have to stop him here to protect the guild.
The rest of them are down for the count after the counterattack from the Thunder Palace.
Do you realize what will happen if we do not stop him here?
You are going to protect the guild?
Whether I protect the guild or destroy the guild, it is my choice!
Did not you say that there was not room enough in the sky for two dragons?
But with all this annoying lightning, you cannot fly in the sky.
Okay, but I am only teaming up this once, Gajeel!
We will settle things one day!
Brilliant Blaze of the Fire Dragon!
That is the power of you working together?
I am shocked you can call yourselves Dragon Slayers.
Did not we damage him at all?
No matter how strong he is, after being hit with all that Dragon Slayer magic...
I hate the old man's lectures, so I kept it a secret.
But I will show you special.
You have got to be kidding me.
You are also a Dragon Slayer?
the old man, the trash in the guild,
I will make them all disappear!
What is with this crazy magical power?
It targets everything the caster sees as an enemy...
Master Makarov's Ultimate Spell of Judgment!
The spell that destroyed Master Joze in one hit...
Now my chance of becoming master just went back up!
I will build it up again from scratch!
It will not lose to anyone!
Everyone will cower in fear before my ultimate guild!
That time we laughed, saying we are both like each other,
we even kindly overlooked the little lies.
If we lose a place to go back to together, I do not care.
Because I will protect that smile.
The meetings and partings numerous as the stars in the sky...
All the things I do not want to lose...
Right now I feel like I do not need any of them.
I just want to see you by my side,
Let us do it like we have just been reborn.
Like flowers blown in a summer wind,
let us bloom brightly in this instant.
This is the most important announcement in history!
We are giving away a full set of the manga so far plus the opening and ending theme CDs
plus all the video games you see here to 20 lucky winners!
Just fill out a postcard and send'them all in!
And next week the battle with Laxus reaches its climax!
Thanks to the awesome giveaway, I did not get any lines!
